entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Millertown 12:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

Humidity: 50 %

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
